Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/profile") public class UserController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling user related requests. It provides endpoints for getting all users, filtering users, getting a user by id, creating a user, updating a user, uploading a user avatar, updating a user's email, password, role, status, visibility, phone number, and deleting a user.

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getUsers()
      This method is used to get all users.
      Returns:
      A list of all users.

    • filterUsers

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/filter") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<User>> filterUsers(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(value="sort",defaultValue="asc") String sort)
      This method is used to filter users.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number.
      size - The size of the page.
      sort - The sort order.
      Returns:
      A page of filtered users.

    • getUserById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> getUserById(@PathVariable("id") Long userId)
      This method is used to get a user by id.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      Returns:
      The user with the given id.

    • createUser

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping(path="/register") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> createUser(@RequestBody UserRequest user)
      This method is used to create a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The request containing the user's name, surname, date of birth, country of origin, email, password, and phone number.
      Returns:
      The created user.

    • updateUserById

      This method is used to update a user by id.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      user - The request containing the user's email, password, and phone number.
